<title level="1" right="Focus 7" pfs="Standard">[Hasted Assault](/Spells.aspx?ID=1039)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 143 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call upon your magic to speed up your attacks. You gain the [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) condition and can use the extra action each round for only Strike actions.
name: Hasted Assault
